structure.unit: Chapter 19 RESPONSIBLE PROPERTY OWNER AND MERCHANT ACT

law.catch_line: Obstructing enforcement officer in the performance of duties.

text.section:
Sec. 19-4.9. Obstructing enforcement officer in the performance of duties.
Whoever opposes, obstructs or resists the enforcement officer or other person authorized by the enforcement officer in the discharge of his duty as provided in this Chapter, upon conviction, shall be guilty of a misdemeanor of the second degree and shall be subject to punishment as provided by law.
